parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge node.

parameters.name: Isp
parameters.description:
The Internet service provider. Valid values:

*   cmcc: China Mobile.
*   unicom: China Unicom.
*   telecom: China Telecom.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SecondaryPublicIpId
parameters.description: The ID of the secondary public IP address.
